org.efaps.db.store

Interface Resource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    XAResource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStoreResource, JCRStoreResource, JDBCStoreResource, VFSStoreResource

    public interface Resource
extends XAResource
    Interface for the StoreResource used to archive files in eFaps.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    The eFaps Team

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Resource.Compress
      Store resource could implement the possibility to compress and uncompress data while writing to and reading from files.
      static class  Resource.StoreEvent
      The store resource could handle three different events: delete write read These three events are defined here and set in instance variable #storeEvent.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface javax.transaction.xa.XAResource

        TMENDRSCAN, TMFAIL, TMJOIN, TMNOFLAGS, TMONEPHASE, TMRESUME, TMSTARTRSCAN, TMSUCCESS, TMSUSPEND, XA_OK, XA_RDONLY

      • open

          throws EFapsException
        Method to open the Resource.
        Parameters:
        _event - Event the store is opened for
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error

      • read

        InputStream read()
                 throws EFapsException
        The input stream with the attached content of the object returned.
        Returns:
        input stream with the content of the file
        Throws:
        EFapsException - if an error occurs

      • write

        long write(InputStream _in,
         long _size,
         String _fileName)
           throws EFapsException
        Writes the file with the given input stream.
        Parameters:
        _in - input stream
        _size - size of the data to write (or negative if the size is not known)
        _fileName - name of the file
        Returns:
        length of the file which is stored
        Throws:
        EFapsException - if an error occurs

            throws EFapsException

           throws EFapsException

      • read

        void read(OutputStream _out)
          throws EFapsException
        The output stream is written with the content of the file. From method read() the input stream is used and copied into the output stream.
        Parameters:
        _out - output stream where the file content must be written
        Throws:
        EFapsException - if an error occurs

      • getFileName

        String getFileName()
                   throws EFapsException
        Get the name of the file.
        Returns:
        filename
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error

        Returns:

        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error

      • initialize

        void initialize(Instance _instance,
              Store _store)
                throws EFapsException
        Method called to initialize this StoreResource.
        Parameters:
        _instance - Instance of the object this StoreResource is wanted for
        _store - Store this StoreResource belongs to
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error
        See Also:
